_deposit(uint256,uint256).details: Can only be called by authorized address

_withdraw(uint256,uint256).details: Can only be called by authorized address

params.tokenId: ID of the veNFT to query

params.token: Address of reward token to calculate
params.tokenId: ID of veNFT to calculate for

getPriorBalanceIndex(uint256,uint256).details: Uses binary search to find checkpoint index

returns._0: Index of nearest checkpoint before timestamp

getPriorSupplyIndex(uint256).details: Uses binary search to find checkpoint index

returns._0: Index of nearest checkpoint before timestamp

params.tokens: Array of reward token addresses to claim

returns._0: True if token is active for rewards
Timestamp of last claim for this token/veNFT pair

notifyRewardAmount(address,uint256).details: Transfers tokens from caller and updates reward accounting

params.amount: Amount of token to add to rewards
params.token: Address of token to add as reward

params.timestamp: Timestamp of the start of the epoch to renotify

returns._0: Amount of token allocated as rewards for the epoch
Current total supply of staked tokens

DURATION().notice: Duration of each reward epoch in seconds

_deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Records a token deposit and updates checkpoints

_withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Records a token withdrawal and updates checkpoints

authorized().notice: Address permitted to call privileged state-changing functions

balanceOf(uint256).notice: Retrieves current staked balance for a veNFT

checkpoints(uint256,uint256).notice: Gets balance checkpoint data for a veNFT at specific index

earned(address,uint256).notice: Calculates unclaimed rewards for a veNFT

getPriorBalanceIndex(uint256,uint256).notice: Gets historical balance index for a veNFT at timestamp

getPriorSupplyIndex(uint256).notice: Gets historical supply index at timestamp

getReward(uint256,address[]).notice: Claims accumulated rewards for a veNFT

isReward(address).notice: Checks if a token is configured as a reward token

lastEarn(address,uint256).notice: Retrieves timestamp of last reward claim for a veNFT

notifyRewardAmount(address,uint256).notice: Adds new reward tokens for distribution

numCheckpoints(uint256).notice: Number of balance checkpoints for a veNFT

renotifyRewardAmount(uint256,address).notice: in case rewards where distributed during a epoch with no deposits, redistribute the rewards

rewardsListLength().notice: Number of tokens configured for rewards

supplyCheckpoints(uint256).notice: Gets total supply checkpoint data at specific index

supplyNumCheckpoints().notice: Total number of supply checkpoints recorded

tokenRewardsPerEpoch(address,uint256).notice: Gets reward amount allocated for a specific epoch

totalSupply().notice: Total amount of staking tokens locked in contract

ve().notice: Address of the VotingEscrow contract that manages veNFTs

voter().notice: Address of the Voter contract that manages rewards
